item.title: Version 0.7.0
item.description:
SupaSidebar 0.7.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Live Browser Tabs: View active tabs from supported browsers directly inside the sidebar so you can jump back without context switching.
  • Arc Imports: Bring your saved pages from Arc into SupaSidebar to populate spaces in seconds.

Minor Changes

  • Command Panel Suggestions: Smarter recommendations surface the most relevant apps, pages, and saves while you type.
  • Right Arrow Shortcut: Press the Right Arrow key in the command panel to convert the highlighted suggestion into editable text before launching.
